bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Oxyrhyncha, A Village in the Arsinoite Nome.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. The name of the village. - 2. The location of Oxyrhyncha. - 3. The population. - 4. Administration. - 5. Land. - 6. The economy. - 7. The documents [archives and other documents]. - P. 55: P. Vindob. Barbara Inv. 8 (= S.B. XVI, 12671 = the frontispiece of the periodical "Tyche"]: ἔλα⟨ι⟩α καὶ ὄπια is an erroneous reading; read ἐλαικὰ φορτία.

bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007

bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Graeco-Roman Oxyrhyncha, A Village in the Arsinoite Nome.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 55-73, 7 tabl., 1 fig., 1 carte.

[Introduction.] - 1. The name of the village. - 2. The location of Oxyrhyncha. - 3. The population. - 4. Administration. - 5. Land. - 6. The economy. - 7. The documents [archives and other documents]. - P. 55: P. Vindob. Barbara Inv. 8 (= S.B. XVI, 12671 = the frontispiece of the periodical "Tyche"]: ἔλα⟨ι⟩α καὶ ὄπια is an erroneous reading; read ἐλαικὰ φορτία.
